Segment.name: W08
Segment.comment: To identify carrier equipment and condition

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: Routing
Field.comment: Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: SealNumber1
Field.comment: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

Field.name: SealNumber2
Field.comment: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

Field.name: SealStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating condition of door seal upon arrival

Field.name: UnitLoadOptionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying loading or unloading a shipment

SyntaxNote.name: R0204
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of W0802 or W0804 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either W0804 or W0805 is present, then the other is required.
